title: Rilru lawmin kan fak a che
lyrics:
Rilru lawmin kan fak a che,
Thinlung hlim tak pawh kanhlan che;
Nangma kutin min hruai fo thin,
Kan Kristian pawl min chei mawi thin.

Lawm takin kan ding ang, rilru hmun khat puin,
Sual, lungngaih, nat ata mi bo hruai chhuak turin;
Hei hi kan tum ni se, Isua hming hril darh hi,
Kan Tlantu leh a hmangihna thu mak puan darh tur hi.

Inhmangaih leh inthuruala,
Heta kan inkhawm ho laiin,
Kan tawngtaina thleng chho sela,
Kan Pa hnenah rimtui angin.

Aw Nang, ringtute thian i ni,
Kan kawngah hian min hruai langin;
Nangma kut thahrui chak hmang la,
Kan Kriatian pawl min hum turin.
